// Create a class containing a float and use it to demonstrate aliasing during
// method calls
package Operators;

/**
 * @author nazarko
 *
 */
class Flo {
	float a;
}
public class Ex_3 {
	static void f(Flo a) {
		a.a = 1.23f;
	}

	/**
	 * @param args
	 */
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		System.out.println("Operators / Ex_3");
		Flo b = new Flo();
		
		b.a = 12.34f;
		System.out.println("b.a = " + b.a);
		f(b);	
		System.out.println("b.a = " + b.a);
	}

}
